summary: An interior remodel of Arch Mage's Quarters
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Simply remodels the Arch Mage's quarters with new furniture and clutter.
I have not gone to far so the interior is not citchy.There is furniture and clutter that suits the Arch Mage.
Pictures tell more than words.

But the Arch Mage Quarters are an area which is most difficult for modding.Some of new added items for some reason
are weightless,so if you encounter that problem that the stuffs are flying when you walk into them,I recommend that you simple watch your step and avoid some of the clutter which is for some reason wightless.

[i]Hope you like itÂ  :)
